radiographic_examinations.findings: 8 mm lingular nodule unchanged, linear opacity in the right lower lobe likely reflects platelike atelectasis, three small hepatic hypodensities unchanged, left parapelvic cysts noted, fluid collection in the right lower quadrant concerning for abscess, mild surrounding inflammatory change, fluid-filled and dilated appendix with wall hyperemia, 7.5 x 6.1 x 5.0 cm fluid collection in the cul-de-sac concerning for abscess.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Lung bases and hepatic hypodensities unchanged since prior study, fluid collections in the right lower quadrant and pelvis developed concerning features.
